definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: The diplomatic relations between the two countries have been ruptured.
sentences.chinese: 兩國外交關係已經斷絕。

sentences.english: She told them how much it grieved her that they were separated.
sentences.chinese: 她們斷絕往來，她感到無比難受。

sentences.english: He has threatened to shut himself off from the family.
sentences.chinese: 他威脅要與家庭斷絕來往。

sentences.english: Sara has decided to burn bridges with her hot-tempered boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉決定和脾氣暴躁的男朋友斷絕聯繫。

sentences.english: At the same time, it cut ties with HBGary.
sentences.chinese: 同時，它還與HBGary斷絕了來往。

sentences.english: Whoever does work on it, that person is cut off from among his kin.
sentences.chinese: 不管誰在這一天工作，這個人要和他的家族斷絕關係。

sentences.english: The woman gave up her lover to save her marriage.
sentences.chinese: 這位女人爲了挽救婚姻斷絕了與情夫的來往。

sentences.english: The revocation or renunciation of an agency may be made expressly or impliedly by conduct.
sentences.chinese: 廢止或斷絕代理，可以明示或暗示處理。

sentences.english: I will be through with this man.
sentences.chinese: 我會和這個男人斷絕來往。

sentences.english: I was prepared to break up with my family.
sentences.chinese: 我已經做好了與家裏斷絕關係的準備。

sentences.english: When she found out about our relationship, she cut off communication with him.
sentences.chinese: 當她發現他和我戀愛後，她就斷絕了和他的聯繫。

sentences.english: You can't stop going with an old friend on account of rumors .
sentences.chinese: 你不能因爲謠言就和一個老朋友斷絕來往。

sentences.english: May his descendants be cut off, their names blotted out from the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 願他的後人斷絕，名字被塗抹，不傳於下代。

sentences.english: She broke off with her best friend .
sentences.chinese: 她與自己最好的朋友斷絕了往來。

sentences.english: Let his posterity be cut off; and in the generation following let their name be blotted out.
sentences.chinese: 願他的後人斷絕，名字被塗抹，不傳於下代。

sentences.english: We have broken off all ties with that company.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經跟那家公司斷絕來往。

definition: to be in a tangle/to nag
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
to rupture/to burst open/to break/to break off relations with/a rupture
to drift apart/to become estranged/to alienate/estrangement
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe
to confuse one thing with another (idiom); to muddle
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
